|                                                                                                     |   - Even here there was a dissent, demonstrating the VERY high IIED bar for plaintiffs                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                     +---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                     | #####                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     | ##### **IIED v. OTHER TORTS: IIED typically used to address a PERSISTENT PATTERN of intentional or reckless emotionally abusive behavior**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [Restatement on knowledge of sensitivities:]{.underline}                                            | - The extreme and outrageous character of the conduct may arise from the actor\'s knowledge that the other **is peculiarly susceptible** to emotional distress, by reason of some physical or mental condition or peculiarity. The conduct may become heartless, flagrant, and outrageous when the actor **proceeds in the face of such knowledge**, where it would not be so if he did not know                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     | - It must be emphasized again, however, that major outrage is essential to the tort; and the mere fact that the actor knows that the other will regard the conduct as **insulting, or** will have his **feelings hurt, is not enough**."                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [Restatement on severity of distress:]{.underline}                                                  | - "Complete emotional tranquility \[sic.\] is seldom attainable in this world, and **some degree of transient and trivial emotional distress is a part of the price of living among people**. The law intervenes only where the distress inflicted is **so severe that no reasonable man could be expected to endure it**. The intensity and the duration of the distress are factors to be considered in determining its severity. Severe distress must be proved; but in many cases the extreme and outrageous character of the defendant\'s conduct is in itself important evidence that the distress has existed.     |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **IIED has a very high evidentiary bar for plaintiffs**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What is extreme and outrageous?                                                                     | - **[Comment d]{.underline}: extreme and outrageous conduct: "beyond all possible bounds of decency," "utterly intolerable in a civilized community;" does not include petty oppressions or annoyances. Depends on community standards.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| (Restatement)                                                                                       | - **[Comment f]{.underline}: the extreme and outrageous character may be because the actor knows the other is "peculiarly susceptible," where it wouldn't be if the actor didn't know**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     |   - *Hypo: Ahmed KNEW that his roommates had had a traumatic experience with blood as a child, and DELIBERATELY slaughtered a pig in the kitchen to freak out the roommate who hates blood.*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     | - **[Comment j]{.underline}: law intervenes only where "no reasonable man could be expected to endure" the distress due to its intensity and duration**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                     +---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                     | > ***GTE Southwest***: IIED found. Boss used profanity, shouted, charged at employees in a humiliating manner.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                     | >                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                     | > ***Jones v. Clinton***: Clinton made unwelcome sexual advances. Court held no IIED because only happened once.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                     | >                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                     | > ***Morgan v. Anthony***: Found IIED. DF made lewd comments, would not let PL close her car door, followed her with car.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What is NOT extreme and outrageous?                                                                 | - [Comment d]{.underline}: Does not extend to mere insults, indignities, threats, annoyances, petty oppressions, or other trivialities                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     |   - ***GTE Southwest***: Beyond mere insults, etc.,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     | - *Hypo: An employer [knows]{.underline} an employee has anxiety and trauma, and [purposefully]{.underline} targets verbal abuse to the employee's anxieties persistently for a year. The employee's physical and mental health deteriorates[. Is the manager's behavior sufficiently extreme and outrageous? Probably yes.]{.underline}*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     |   - Tort should be tracking shared intuitions about appropriate behaviors and what transgresses that                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What is intentional or reckless?                                                                    | - Intent: purpose or substantial certainty (see battery).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     | - [Reckless:]{.underline} person acts recklessly in engaging in conduct if:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     | > \(a\) the person knows of the risk of harm created by the conduct or knows facts that make the risk obvious to another in the person's situation, AND                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                     | >                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                     | > \(b\) the precaution that would eliminate or reduce the risk involves burdens that are so slight relative to the magnitude of the risk as to render the person\'s failure to adopt the precaution a demonstration of the person\'s indifference to the risk.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                     +---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                     | ***Golston v. Lincoln Cemetery:*** it was at least reckless, maybe intentional, for the cemetery to bury a woman in a shallow grave so that relatives discovered her exposed body upon visiting the gravesite.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What is severe emotional distress?                                                                  | ***GTE Southwest:*** No reasonable person could be expected to endure. Medical evidence of PTSD is sufficient.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     | ***Jones v. Clinton:*** difficult to prove if no physical indicator.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \[Third person\]                                                                                    | Where such conduct is directed at a third person, the actor is subject to liability if he intentionally or recklessly causes severe emotional distress                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     | 1.  to a member of such person\'s immediate family / who is present at the time, (whether or not such distress results in bodily harm,) OR                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                     | 2.  to any other person who is present at the time, IF such distress results in bodily harm                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

***GTE SOUTHWEST v. BRUCE** -- 998 S.W.2d 605 (Tex. 1999)*

- Not enough that defendant acted with intent that was tortious, criminal, or intended to inflict emotional distress, or even conduct with malice*â†’ needs to be so outrageous in character, so extreme, to go beyond all possible bounds of decency to be regarded as so atrocious, and utterly intolerable in a civilized community*

- If the person doing the conduct is aware of a person being peculiarly susceptible to emotional distress by reason of some physical or mental condition or peculiarity. Conduct may become outrageous when an actor proceeds in face of such knowledge, where it would not be if he did not know *â†’ Conduct can be outrageous* in virtue *of P's sensitivities + D's knowledge of them*

***Note:*** IIED threshold is hard to satisfy, and demonstrating emotional distress suffered is hard (some people respond to trauma by being high functioning, especially after sexual assault)

### Injury to Property

#### Trespass to Land

+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[Trespass to Property (RESTATEMENT)]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| One is subject to liability to another for trespass, (irrespective of whether he thereby causes harm to any legally protected interest of the other,) if he **intentionally** (single)*:*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

|                                                                                               | **INTENT = PURPOSE or SUBSTANTIAL CERTAINTY**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | a.  *HYPO: Letting dogs loose next to plaintiff's land. Purpose is not to trespass, but it's substantially certain that the defendant caused something to enter the land -- intent is satisfied.*                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | b.  *HYPO: Throwing a ball onto the land on purpose, without knowing that it is someone else's land -- intent is satisfied.*                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | c.  *HYPO: Throwing a ball onto the land by ACCIDENT (aka missing the goal on YOUR land) -- intent is NOT satisfied because did not intent to enter the land*                                                                                                                                                                                        |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                               | 1)  **[INTENTION *DOES* NEED TO BE TO ENTER THE LAND]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |     a.  *Tripped onto the land: not trespass*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |     b.  Intention to move on the land, not to enter another person's specific property.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | 2)  **[INTENTION DOES *NOT* NEED TO BE TO TRESPASS]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |     a.  IRRESPECTIVE OF WHETHER YOU *KNOW* IT\'S THEIR PROPERTY â†’ entering the land satisfies the damage requirement                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |     b.  No intention requirement: You can commit the act + consequence completely "innocently" - you may have no idea that what you are doing is resulting in the harm                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | **This is a low bar for plaintiffs -- don't need harm or offense or imminent apprehension**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                               | **EXAMPLE OF ENTRY WITHOUT INTENTION:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | a.  **Kidnapping**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[(a)]{.mark} Enters land in the possession of the other, OR causes a thing or a third person to do so**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                               | [***Dougherty v. Stepp***:]{.mark} [even though he didn't do any damage and thought it was his land, he intentionally made a step, so the neighbor is held liable]{.underline}.                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | **[FACTS:]{.underline}** Dougherty (P) owns plot of unenclosed land. Stepp (D) enters the land to perform a survey with his team. He does not do any physical damage to the land, mark any trees, or cut any timber. Trial court instructed jury that no damage had been inflicted, and thus, no trespass occurred. Jury returned verdict for Stepp. |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - No harm -- nominal damages, and bringing trespass claims was a way in the past for neighbors to settle property lines                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - PERMISSION TO ENTER: Other ways to check land boundaries are (1) Court order; (2) Ask permission                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |   - Liability turns on permission to enter a space                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |   - Or maybe trespass is literally too stringent!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | **[HOLDING:]{.underline}** An unauthorized entry onto someone else's land constitutes a trespass even if no damage or harm is done.                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - Every unauthorized entry is trespass. From every entry against the will of a possessor, the law infers some damage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - If the land had been cultivated or enclosed by a fence, Stepps entry would have clearly been a trespass, so it's just as much a trespass even if it was unenclosed.                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | **[RULE:]{.underline} Unauthorized entry = trespass, even if no damage. Trespass itself necessarily implies damage.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - Act is walking onto the land; consequence is being on someone else\'s property (whether you know it or not); harm is violating the will of the owner -- accidents/mistakes/innocent trespasses count -- the consequence *is* the harm in trespass                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - **Unauthorized entry is a harm because it "violates the will" of the property owner**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - **Trespass is interested only in authorization, not results.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | **[DAMAGES:]{.underline} Nominal damages** when there is no harm -- expressive form of compensation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                               | **[Requirements:]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - **Act:** walking (or driving, or releasing animals, throwing a ball, etc.), which you must intend (with purpose or substantial certainty).                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - **Consequence:** entering the land that is *in fact* another's property                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - **Harm:** violating the will of the owner by entering property, *need not intend it* (mistaken/accidental trespass counts)                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | **[Ways of Trespassing]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - Setting foot on land                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - Entering land by vehicle                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - Throwing something onto someone's land                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - Remaining on someone's land after they have withdrawn permission for you to be there/asked you to leave                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - Causing something to be in their land, like an animal                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                               | **[EFFECTS - Trespasser liable for all consequences and effects that flowed from their trespass, no matter how severe:]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - Trespass might actually be useful as a tort in those situations when it DOES lead to disaster                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |   - Innocent party should not bear the burden                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
