|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - *E.g., kids who trespassed, set fire on the grill, and then fire burned down the house: [Liable for ALLLL effects]{.underline}*                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |   - *What if kids had formerly been allowed on the land prior owner and did not know that they were no longer allowed there? [STILL liable because they willfully entered the land]{.underline}*                                                                                                                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                               | **OR**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[(b)]{.mark} Remains on the land**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                               | E.g., someone gives you permission to enter, but then you refuse to leave.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                               | **OR**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[(c)]{.mark} Fails to remove from the land a thing which he is under a duty to remove.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| COMPARISONS                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                               | Trespass is unforgiving compared to battery: Someone going for a walk on land that they think is theirs is STILL liable for trespass                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               | - Why?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |   - Information forcing mechanism -- make people learn what their land is and what other people's land is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |   - Evidence of private law and common law's value of the sanctity and security of property                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

#### Trespass to Chattel

â†’ NOTE KEY DIFFERENCE WITH TRESPASS TO REAL LAND: HARM REQUIREMENT

- If accidentally using someone else's stuff didn't require damage, it would be a shit show.

[RST on Chattel]{.underline}

- "intentionally dispossessing another of the chattel or using or intermeddling with a chattel in the possession of another

  - Intentional interference with *physical property* (as opposed to real property or land)

  - Unlike trespass to land, requires there to be a chattel-related harm

    - Do not need to intend the damages, but **they do need to exist** (not just violation on the will like trespass to land)

## Affirmative Defenses to Intentional Torts ("Even if I did it, I still shouldn't be held liable")

###  1. Consent 

+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[Consent (RST Â§892)]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |

| **[RESTATEMENT Â§892:]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| **[(1)]{.mark} Consent is willingness in fact for conduct to occur. It may be manifested by action OR inaction and need not be communicated to the actor.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| **[(2)]{.mark} If words or conduct are reasonably \[objective\] understood \[subjective\] by another to be intended as consent, they constitute apparent consent and are as effective as consent in fact.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ***Mohr v. Williams:***                                                                     | Spirit of affirmative defense without the letter of it. No consent to a battery charge. Consent to have surgery in one ear does not constitute consent for the other ear.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| Medical malpractice case -- example (like trespass) tort law serving other social functions | (1) Hypothetical "would have" consent is not sufficient.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | (2) Not emergency.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | **1905 -- BEFORE THE RESTATEMENT**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | **Facts:** Ear surgeon Williams was supposed to operate on Mohr\'s right ear but could not examine the left ahead of time -- got consent for right ear only. Williams found during surgery the left was much worse and right not as bad, so checked with Mohr\'s doctor and successfully operated on the left, after which Mohr claimed damage to her left ear and that she had not consented.                     |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | - Williams argued that: (1) there was [no required intent]{.underline} for battery (touching not intended to be harmful) and was not negligent; (2) that it was [necessary]{.underline}, and (3) [constructive consent -]{.underline} that had she known she *would* have consented (as her doctor did)                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | **Holding:** The surgeons is liable for battery. **SINGLE INTENT**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | - Jury rejected implied consent and found battery                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | - **Single intent for battery -- do not need to show that intent was to harm; only that intent was to touch, and touch caused harm.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | - This was "not a mere pleasantry"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             |   - *Not a mere pleasantry: a kick to the face*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             |   - *A mere pleasantry: A handshake (informal presumption of consent for a handshake given societal norms)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | **Relevance:** Law NOW recognizes an emergency exception, **CONTRARY** to this case                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ***O'Brian v. Cunard Steamship***                                                           | Plaintiff gave implicit consent for vaccination when she waited in the vaccination line and then stuck out her arm to the surgeon.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | - At the border, she stuck out her arm for inspection; the surgeon did not see a smallpox vaccination mark and she gets a vaccination. She then uses the vaccine confirmation (required) as a ticket into the US.                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             |   - Battery claim for unwanted vaccination because she had an *extreme adverse reaction*. This was not actually a frivolous claim.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             |   - Court finds that she gave **[APPARENT CONSENT]{.underline}**.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             |     - 1\. Subjective: Defendant DID actually believe that he had consent to give the vaccine                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             |     - 2\. Objective: Was the defendant's belief **REASONABLE**??                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #### Effect of Consent:                                                                     | One who effectively consents to conduct (cannot recover (in an action of tort for the conduct or for harm resulting from it).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| #### Â§892A                                                                                  | - Consent is assumed in certain contexts, e.g. sports.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                             | - Consenting to illegal activity is an exception.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **HOW CONSENT WORKS IN CASE ANALYSIS: TWO ROUTES**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #### 1. ACTUAL CONSENT                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | - Court will look to see if the plaintiff did in fact consent. Purely subjective.                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | - The question for actual consent is: **Was the PLAINTIFF SUBJECTIVELY WILLING for the conduct to occur?**                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |   - Behavior that manifests a subjective willingness for the conduct to occur. ("Yes"; thumbs up; nod)                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |   - Evidence shows that the plaintiff agreed.                                                                                                                                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #### 2. APPARENT CONSENT (Mohr)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | - Two prong inquiry for apparent consent: subjective [and]{.underline} objective                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |   1)  [Subjective:]{.underline} **Did the DEFENDANT actually believe that they had consent?**                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |   2)  [Objective:]{.underline} **Was the defendant's belief REASONABLE?**                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |       - Doctors don't get a free pass -- either consent or emergency action                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |       - Good intentions are not determinative                                                                                                                                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **OR: EMERGENCY ACTION DOCTRINE Â§892D**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #### Emergency doctrine                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | **[RST (2d.) Â§ 892D Emergency Action Without Consent]{.underline}** (***Mohr*** would be decided differently today)                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| #### Â§892D                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Conduct that injures another does not make the actor liable to the other, even though the other has not consented to it if:                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | (a) an emergency makes it necessary or apparently necessary, in order to prevent harm to the other, to act before there is opportunity to obtain consent from the other or one empowered to consent for him, AND |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | (b) the actor has no reason to believe that the other, if he had the opportunity to consent, would decline.                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               +------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | ***EXAMPLES** -- doctors, saving someone who is drowning, etc.*                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | ***REASONS** -- don't want to discourage people when it is a matter of life or death; implied consent*                                                                                                           |

### Self-Defense

| #### By force not threatening death / serious bodily harm (Â§63)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| (1) An actor is privileged to use **reasonable force**, not intended or likely to cause death or serious bodily harm, to defend himself against unprivileged harmful or offensive contact or other bodily harm which he reasonably believes that another is about to inflict intentionally upon him.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |

|                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| (2) Self-defense is privileged under the conditions stated in Subsection (1), \[even if\] the actor correctly or reasonably believes that he can avoid the necessity of so defending himself,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |

| <!-- -->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| (b) by complying with a command with which the actor is under no duty to comply or which the other is not privileged to enforce by the means threatened.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
