|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| (a) retreating if attacked in any place other than his dwelling place, or in a place which is also the dwelling of the other, or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| (b) relinquishing the exercise of any right or privilege other than his privilege to prevent intrusion upon or dispossession of his dwelling place or to effect a lawful arrest.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #### Liability to Third Person (Â§75)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| An act which is privileged for the purpose of protecting the actor from a harmful or offensive contact or other invasion of his interests of personality subjects the actor to **liability to a third person for any harm unintentionally done to him ONLY if the actor realizes or should realize that his act creates an unreasonable risk of causing such harm. \[NEGLIGENCE\]**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                            | *HYPOS:* If Courvoisier aimed at a rioter, and the bullet ricocheted and hit a policeman:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                            | - Incur liability IF you acted negligently (required separate negligence analysis)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Proportionality: Application of Force Must Be Proportional                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

### Defense of Property

- Who cares if the tort was committed -- I should not be held liable because of these reasons.

- Argue all the way:

  - \(1\) I didn't do that

  - \(2\) \[AFFIRMATIVE DEFENSE\]: if I did, I shouldn't be liable

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #### Defense of property (Â§77, 79)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| Different question than self-defense: what will likely happen if you do not defend?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

| **[By force NOT threatening death / serious bodily harm]{.underline}: (Restatement (2d.) Â§ 77)**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| An actor is privileged to use **reasonable force, not intended or likely to cause death or serious bodily harm**, to prevent or terminate another\'s intrusion upon the actor\'s land or chattels, if                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| (a) **the intrusion is not privileged or the other intentionally or negligently causes the actor to believe that it is not privileged, AND**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| (b) **the actor reasonably believes that the intrusion can be prevented or terminated *only* by the force used, AND**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| (c) **the actor has first requested the other to desist and the other has disregarded the request, OR the actor reasonably believes that a request will be useless or that substantial harm will be done before it can be made.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                         | **[If nemesis enters your property (trespass) and *isn't* doing anything:]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         | - First, request that they leave                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         | - He kicks up flowers and knocks over mailbox.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         |   - KEYSTONE IS PROPORTIONALITY: You can threaten and can make REASONABLE CONTACT (spray with hose, etc.) but don't hit with baseball bat or otherwise cause serious bodily harm                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         | - He is brandishing knife or doing things that trigger self-defense                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         |   - **QUESTION: What is likely to happen if you do not expel the intruder?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         |   - \[could raise BOTH defense of property AND self-defense\]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         | **[This doctrine is one of the legal reasons why SIT-INS are a viable political strategy!]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         | - If someone is sitting on your property as a political strategy and not threatening harm, no carte blanche to get them off (have to instead call the proper authorities)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[By force threatening death / serious bodily harm]{.underline}: (Restatement (2d.) Â§ 79)**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Privileged if, but only if, the actor **reasonably believes** that the intruder, unless expelled or excluded, is ***likely* to cause death or serious bodily harm** to the actor or to a third person whom the actor is privileged to protect.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                         | ***Katco v. Briney (spring gun):*** Liable. Thief's leg destroyed, nobody in the house.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         | **FACTS:** D places a spring-triggered shotgun in his old, boarded up house, which is a few miles from his home, because people continued to break-in even after he put up "no trespass" signs. The gun was literally a secret trap gun (no warning of security system in place) and it was pointed down, at leg-level. Plaintiff broke in and was shot in the leg. **Court holds D liable in consequential AND punitive damages.** |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         | **RULE -- TRIAL INSTRUCTION UPHELD: PRIVILEGING HUMAN LIFE OVER PROPERTY:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         | **[The measure of force cannot be life threatening or inflict great bodily harm - the dangerous device is ONLY justified when the trespasser is committing a [felony of violence]{.underline} OR [felony punishable by death]{.underline}.]{.mark}**                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         | - Was this the right level?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         |   a.  NARROWER VIEW: Brineys and others think that the sanctity of property is not being values                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         |   b.  BROADER VIEW: To use THAT kind of force should NOT be allowed to be automatic at all; a human being needs to make the judgment about that kind of force                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         | - HUGE POLITICAL OUTCRY: The public sympathizes with the property owners.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         |   a.  People throughout the country are sympathetic to Briney, and he remains unrepentant about the act.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                         |   b.  In these cases, there is evidence of a social norm more sympathetic to self-defense or defense of property than the law has historically allowed. This is an example of a deviation between legal doctrine and society thinking. Should the law follow social norms or should it keep them in check?                                                                                                                          |
