### Necessity 

+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #### Necessity (Â§196, 197): Defense to TRESPASS                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Qualified Privilege:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| even if you successfully invoke this defense, you may still be held liable for consequential damages.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |

| NECESSITY DEFENSE:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| 1.  DEFENSE TO TRESPASS ONLY                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| 2.  QUALIFIED DEFENSE TO TRESPASS, NOT ABSOLUTE                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|     a.  All the other defenses are [absolute]{.underline} defenses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|     b.  Also: ONLY necessity can also be claimed as a qualified PRIVILEGE, in addition to a qualified DEFENSE (others are only defenses)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #### Private necessity (Â§197)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **(1) One is privileged to enter or remain on land in the possession of another if it *is* *OR* *reasonably appears to be* necessary to prevent serious harm to**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| (a) the actor, or his land or chattels, OR                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| (b) the other or a third person, or the land or chattels of either, unless the actor knows or has reason to know that the one for whose benefit he enters is unwilling that he shall take such action.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | -                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - ***Ploof v. Putnam (poor guy tying boat in storm)***: Trespass is necessary, landowner must pay damages for refusing to let board.                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | <!-- -->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - Ploof owned a boat and was sailing w/ wife and kids on Lake Champlain when a storm began -- he docked to Putnam\'s dock and was untied by D\'s servant. The boat and its contents were destroyed and Ploof and his family were injured -- both want damages. Ploof invokes a necessity defense affirmatively. |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - **Holding:** Necessity is a privilege sometimes giving individuals the right to trespass, excusing the action here.                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - **Other examples given:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - Highway obstructions and detours; chasing errant cows; saving goods in danger of being destroyed by water or fire; etc.                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Who gets to decide if there was necessity? The jury --                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - "Reasonably appears to be necessary to prevent serious harm"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - "REASONABLE" = FACTUAL ANALYSIS                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | ***HYPO:* What if the Ploof family was known to be infected with a nasty contagious disease, and by mooring to the dock, Ploof was certain to infect the servant and anyone the servant came in contact with. Use the COMMENT C BALANCING TEST.**                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - **[Comment c]{.underline}:** In determining the question of reasonableness, the probable advantage to the actor to be expected from the **ENTRY** \[*BC TRESPASS-SPECIFIC DEFENSE\]* must be **weighed against the probable detriment** to the possessor of the land or other persons properly upon it.       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - Classic balancing test: Weighing human life against property; value human life                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - Uncomfy to weigh human life against human life                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | ***HYPO:* What if Ploof had contributed to needing to dock on Putnam's land? I.e., he angered the mob and is running.**                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - Ploof can raise necessity if it **reasonably appears to be necessary to prevent serious harm (Â§197)**                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - Endangering innocent bystanders? Probably gonna lose.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - Necessity can involve man-made situations                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - E.g., if people are getting out of burning car after a crash, they can escape onto a private lawn -- no matter whether the brakes failed or they were driving carelessly                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |     - Qualified though, so must still pay!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | **[Necessity creates a PRIVILEGE: An objectively reasonable claim of necessity operates as a trump card]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - Defense of property: Can use reasonable force UNLESS the entry is "privileged" -- e.g., necessity!                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - But how does a landowner know if someone has a genuinely "necessary" privilege?                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |     - The law authorizes you to prevent intrusion if it is a close call                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |     - If an intruder is threatening, necessity claim is weaker (because balancing competing claims of human lives from comment c) and self-defense claim is stronger (not defense of property)                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - All the privilege of necessity ensures is that Putnam's servant stands-by (no affirmative duty)                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | ***HYPO:* What if Ploof needed to knock out a kayaker to save his family?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - NOT necessity -- you can damage a dock, but not shoot another person!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | ***HYPO, CON'T:* Would the emergency doctrine apply? *(modern innovation that would make Mohr surgery acceptable today)***                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - NOT emergency action because emergency action is action that the person WOULD CONSENT TO                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - It is a subset of the CONSENT DEFENSE!!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \(2\) Where the entry is for the benefit of the actor or a third person, he is **subject to liability for any harm done in the exercise of the privilege** stated in Subsection (1) to any legally protected interest of the possessor in the land or connected with it, except where the threat of harm to avert which the entry is made is caused by the tortious conduct or contributory negligence of the possessor.                                                                                                       |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - ***Vincent v. Lake Erie Transp. Co (storm parking damaged dock)***: Poor guy still must pay.                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - D\'s steamship moored to P\'s dock when a storm broke out -- D tried to get a tug but could not, and D\'s workers continually replaced lines to stay at dock. Steamship continually hit the dock and P sued for damages -- defense was that D had no alternative and was not careless.                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |     - Dock owner does nothin                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - **Holding:** [Necessity defense valid here, but it is qualified, not absolute -- can tie to dock, but must pay for damages caused by necessary act]{.underline}                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |     - **Dissent:** NO FAULT (in any conduct to create the situation); NO LIABILITY (in the effects of an inevitable accident)                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |       - When there is an accident where neither party is at fault, it's more fair to let the chips fall (dock owner made a dock and could have expected this or gotten insurance)                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |       - No negligence so should be seen as an inevitable accident -- leave the losses where they fall, no basis to intervene                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - **Relevance:** Self-defense and necessity both use reasonable belief standards and encourage the protection of life                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   <!-- -->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - Self-defense absolves D of liability while necessity does not -- in essence, the P is responsible in self-defense cases but *not* in necessity cases                                                                                                                                                        |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #### Public necessity (Â§196)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| One is privileged to enter land in the possession of another if it is, or if the actor reasonably believes it to be, necessary for the purpose of **averting an imminent public disaster.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |

| **[Why did Shaw do this move towards modern negligence?]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| - **The Subsidy Thesis, Horowitz (Critical Legal Studies):** The turn to negligence coincides with the vast turn to industry. A negligence rule arguably subsidized the modern industrial economy because under negligence the industries would not need to be accountable for every injury caused, only those that were *careless.* Evolved in a way that was permissive to corporate industrial interests.    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| - **Criticism:** The common law judges were mostly past corporate lawyers, and tort system actually did make other claims eligible.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
