# Modern Negligence 

+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Negligence Intro: Big Picture Elements**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
+====================================+====================================+=======================================================================================+===================================+===================================+==============================+==============================+
| - Negligence is its own tort, like battery -- it is an extraordinarily flexible vehicle                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| - **Negligence is used in two different ways in tort law:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **1. THE TORT OF NEGLIGENCE:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Negligence as its own tort, that must satisfy ALLL OF ITS ELEMENTS (duty/breach/causation/damages), just like battery or false imprisonment                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| (In torts, no "gross negligence" or anything -- just allll four elements to create the tort of negligence.)                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1\. DUTY                                                                | 2\. BREACH                                                                            | 3\. CAUSATION                     | 4\. DAMAGES                                                                                     |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| There is a default baseline: Presumption of duty of reasonable care     | Did the defendant's conduct breach the duty of reasonable care? (Fault = No due care) | 1\. Factual Causation             | Was there actual harm? How should that be compensated. (e.g., someone lost a finger)            |
|                                                                         |                                                                                       |                                   |                                                                                                 |
|                                                                         |                                                                                       | AND                               | - EGGSHELL SKULL RULE                                                                           |
|                                                                         |                                                                                       |                                   |                                                                                                 |
|                                                                         |                                                                                       | 2\. Proximate Causation           |                                                                                                 |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **2. ACTING NEGLIGENTLY = BEING NEGLIGENT = BREACHING DUTY** \[DIFFERENT FROM CRIMINAL NEGLIGENCE\]                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
+------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------+------------------------------+
|                                    | 2\. BREACH (only)                                                                                                                                                                                  |                              |                              |
+------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------+------------------------------+
|                                    | Breaching is falling below the duty of care and reasonable person standard                                                                                                                         |                              |                              |
|                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                              |                              |
|                                    | To establish *prima faciae* negligence, breach (BEING NEGLIGENT) is only one of FOUR necessary elements of the TORT OF NEGLIGENCE                                                                  |                              |                              |
+------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------+------------------------------+

## BREACH: The Negligence Standard

### The Reasonable Person \[BREACH\] 

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[Was there BREACH?]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| **=**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| **[Was the defendant negligent? Did the defendant fail the reasonable person standard? Was the defendant at fault?]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+:==========================================================================================================================================================:+::+
| **[Under what circumstances can we characterize a defendant's conduct as negligent?]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| **SYNONYMS FOR BREACH: Reasonable Care = Due Care = At Fault = Falls below the reasonable person standard = Negligent (with a T)**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **The Reasonable Person (Â§283)**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Unless the actor is a child, the standard of conduct to which he must conform to avoid being negligent is that of a reasonable man under like circumstances.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Who is the reasonable person?**                                                                                                                          | **[The reasonable person is a fictitious person who is never negligent and whose conduct is always up to a standard.]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | Dan Dobbs:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - Normal **intelligence**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - Normal **perception** and **memory**, and at least a minimal standard of **knowledge**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - All the **additional** and **relevant** intelligence, skill, or knowledge that is **in fact possessed by the individual actor,** and                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - Eg. if the actor has special knowledge/expertise, take into consideration.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |     - Could take into account that an actor with special experience in mountain biking in Denver *knew* that the trail would be populated with children on a Saturday                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - The **physical attributes** of the individual actor                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Who is NOT the reasonable man?**                                                                                                                         | **Not** to be not identified with any real person or with members of the jury, individually and collectively                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                            +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                            | **[Not the rational utility maximizer/economically rational person (RESTATEMENT):]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - *Vaughan* would fare well if that were the reasonable person: He has insurance! He could make a rational decision, take a chance, and do something else to maximize utility during that time                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - The reasonable person is a person who is "reasonably considerate of the safety of others and does not look primarily or only to their own advantage"                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                            +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                            | **[Airport Hypo (mother with a child, rushing to catch a flight)]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - **[Vaughan case:]{.underline}** DON'T factor in intelligence level                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                            +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                            | [**Holmes, "The Common Law":** Pragmatist Tradition; skeptic of judicial supremacy]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - "The law takes no account to the infinite varieties of temperament, intellect, and education"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - Someone born to be hasty must come to the standard of neighbors.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - Does consider surrounding circumstances and capacity: blind person, children, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - BECAUSE: "necessary to the general welfare" -- certain standards intuitive conduct in a society                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - Plus, the demands of seeing every man "as God sees them"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |

Pearson]{.mark}***                                                                                                                           | ***12-year boy driving motorboat: operating motorboat is characteristic adult activity.***                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| *(Boat Menace)*                                                                                                                                            | **Facts:** Husband & wife Dellwo fishing at low speed with a line behind them when D, a 12 y/o crossed behind them driving a boat, jerking the line, causing the rod to injure Mrs. Dellow in the eye                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - Lower court ruled for D. P appealed -- contested jury instruction.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - Lower court had the jury modify the negligence standard to be \"the degree of care which ordinarily is exercised by children of like age, mental capacity, and experience under the same or similar circumstances\"                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |     - Subsection (a) -- the sliding scale for children                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - P wanted a higher standard due to the powerful vehicle **suited for adults**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |     - Subsection (c) -- the adult standard (no sliding scale) because of a dangerous activity                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | **Holding:** When children operate an [automobile, airplane, or powerboat]{.underline}, apply the standard for adults                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - *Dellwo* Court: Very narrowly construing subsection (c)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - ***Dellwo narrowly construes subsection (c) -- "dangerous activity characteristically undertaken by adults" is only cars/airplanes/powerboats.***                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - ***BUT THE BROADER RESTATEMENT PROVISION CONTROLS -- CHARACTERISTIC ADULT ACTIVITIES INCLUDE OTHER ACTIVITIES BEYOND CARS/AIRPLANES/BOATS.***                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | **Relevance:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - Development -- contributory negligence when children were *victims*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - Child laborers in factories in the industrial revolution -- suing factories for injuries                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - Factories get out of liability for injuries of child laborers by pointing to the kid's contributory negligence                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - ***Dellwo**:* Modern regime emerges through an inversion: Sliding scale for children EXCEPT for subsection c                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |     - Kids do dumb stuff. But what you want to do is minimize the costs of that. Kids get to be dumb with a pebble and avoid liability; kids don't get to be dumb on a snowmobile and avoid it.                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - Fairness: can\'t tell who is behind the wheel, so cannot guard against youthful imprudence                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - Implication: people are entitled to know everyone is held to the same standard of care and to know if an actor is a child and therefore held to a different one                                                                                                                                                                                              |

|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |

### Calculus of Risk (Hand Formula) 

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Calculus of Risk Thinking**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |

| - The reasonable person does not mean avoiding ALL risks -- the reasonable person does not sit in her house all day avoiding all potentially injurious conduct with others. But how do we identify whether there was a breach of duty or not? Rough calculation of costs and benefits.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **RST Â§3 Negligence**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| A person acts negligently if the person does not exercise reasonable care under all the circumstances. Primary factors to consider in ascertaining whether the person\'s conduct lacks reasonable care are:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| - the foreseeable likelihood \[P: probability of harm\] that the person\'s conduct will result in harm,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ***Bolton v. Stone, PT 1*** (cricket hits person):                                                                                                           | Stone v. Bolton (1950) and Bolton v. Stone (1951) **-- Cricket Flyaway**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              | **[Facts:]{.underline}** Ball flew out of pitch and hit Stone in head, which was uncommon -- 6 times in 30 yrs. Longest hit in 40 years and by a visiting player, but part and parcel of a game of cricket -- not unheard of. P sues cricket club for not erecting a higher fence. The trial court found for D since there were no similar injuries.                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              | - The visiting player was probably not worth a lot; the club has more money. Not an intentional tort, so must pin negligence on club.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              | **[Holding:]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              | [**FIRST SUIT** (plaintiff victim wins)**: Reasonably foreseeable + failed to take precautions = NEGLIGENT**]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              | - Lower court wrote a tricky to implement rule: Negligent conduct results in realizing reasonably foreseeable risk and conduct resulting in an unprecedented occurrence that D could not reasonably foresee is not negligent                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              | - IN THIS CASE: Since it happened 6 times in 30 years, it was reasonably **foreseeable**. So D is liable for negligence.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| - the foreseeable severity \[L: loss, magnitude of harm\] of any harm that may ensue, and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ***Bolton v. Stone, PT 2*** (cricket hits person):                                                                                                           | [Bolton v. Stone, SECOND SUIT]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              | [**SECOND SUIT** (defendant cricket club wins)**:** **Reasonably foreseeable + Substantial Risk of harm (consider likelihood and severity) â†’ reasonable person must take reasonable precautions & remedial measures**]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              | - [Higher ct modified lower ct: Negligent conduct results in \"realizing **reasonably foreseeable risk** and **risk** **of** **injury is substantial**\"]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              | - If the risk is either not foreseeable or not substantial, it is not negligent. Here, risk was small, so there was no negligence                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              | - [People in the defendant's position should consider two things:]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              |   - **1. FORESEEABILITY of the risk**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              |   - **2. SUBSTANTIALITY/MAGNITUDE of the risk** (if the risk of harm is substantial, then the club should not be playing)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              |     - HERE: the risk was not substantial enough to stop the playing of risk all together                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              |     - Risk needs to be SUBSTANTIAL, because otherwise it would just be an impediment to everyday life                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                              |     - Modern life requires that even reasonable people create some risks and accept others -- we draw the line when a person creates [substantial risk]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
