|                                                            | - Process of DISCOUNTING trivializes future harms & irreversibility of environmental harm by valuing present gains over future losses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                            |   - [RESPONSE -- CBA DEFENSE:]{.underline} Scarcity is a simple fact of the human condition. To have more of one good thing, we must settle for less of another. Claiming that different values are incommensurable simply hinders clear thinking about trade-offs.                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
+------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Third RST Approach**                                     | **A person acts negligently if the person does not exercise reasonable care under the circumstances. Primary factors to consider are:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                            | - The foreseeable **likelihood** that the person\'s conduct will result in harm **(P)**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                            | - The foreseeable **severity** of any harm that may ensue **(L)**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                            | - And the burden of **precautions** to eliminate or reduce the risk of harm **(B)**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                            +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                            | [\[RESTATEMENT EMBRACES THE HAND FORMULA -- NOT AN EXPLICIT FORMULA, BUT SUGGESTS THAT A BALANCING TEST HAS A PLACE\]]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                            | - RST trying to extract general principles from many jurisdictions and authors were aware that new situations would occur.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                            | - "PRIMARY FACTORS TO CONSIDER" -- suggests that other secondary factors may exist                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                            |   - Carveouts for emergency, children, physical disability                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                            +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                            | **Restatement on Emergency:** If it is an emergency, that has bearing on whether conduct is that of a reasonable person                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |

### Custom

+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Custom (Â§ 295)**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |

| In determining whether conduct is negligent, **the customs of the community, or of others under like circumstances, are factors to be taken into account, but are not controlling where a reasonable man would not follow them.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ***Overall takeaways***                                                 | - Customs within an industry are well-informed standards                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - 1\. Do we even have a custom here?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - 2\. If there is one, what *exactly* is the custom?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - Was there breach?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - **1. REASONABLE PERSON** is baseline                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - Then make judgment calls about when to do analyses of: **(2) BPL & (3) CUSTOM**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ***TJ Hooper*** (shipwreck because no radio)                            | **Takeaway: [Custom is not the ultimate standard. |                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - Dist. Ct. found testimony that 90% of tugs had radios = industry standard ðŸ¡ª therefore, breach of duty due to being unseaworthy                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - DEFENDANT -- Define custom with specificity (custom = only replace when requested; no custom to affirmatively change it)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |

CUSTOM + REASONABLENESS                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |     - A lot like a custom standard for doctors, since expertise determines the reasonable standards are                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |     - Reasonable doctor relative to your specialty -- a tailored version of custom FOR DOCTORS because you are measured against your ACTUAL PEER DOCTORS                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |     - Did this defendant doctor do what their peers would have done under these circumstances?                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |     - Trying to standardize the skill levels while trying to give some affordance for material constraints                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                | - **[Why no cost-benefit analysis?]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |   - Juries can't weigh systemic error costs very well, especially w sympathetic plaintiffs                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |     - Juries doing ad hoc balancing might make it uncertain and unpredictable for doctors who are acting under industry standard                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |       - Might cause doctors to be too cautious                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                |       - Might cause insurance premiums to go up                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **EXCEPTION: Duty to Disclose**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| **One specific context in medical malpractice where there is an exception to the *Brune* custom standard**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ***Canterbury v. Spence (1972)***                                       | **Facts:** Doctor operated on P\'s back and wasn\'t asked about risks, so only told mom that no more risk than normal ðŸ¡ª did NOT say 1% risk of paralysis. P slipped after surgery and had temporary paralysis and permanent bowel paralysis                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| **Custom is NOT starting point (contrast to *Brune*) ðŸ¡ª reasonableness** | - Doctor told mother surgery no more dangerous than any other surgery                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | **ISSUE: Did the doctor breach his duty to disclose relevant information about the surgery?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - Medical malpractice issues -- (1) TREATMENT; (2) DISCLOSURE                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - Here, the doctor agreed that he gave a less than full accounting but said it was okay: Took it upon himself to decide that 99% success/1% failure meant that anyone would choose the surgery, and said that it could cause psychological trepidation                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |     - **REASONS -- UTILITARIAN & PATERNALISTIC**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |       - (The medical profession had been exceeding homogenous, but "doctor knows best" attitude began to change)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | **Holding:** Physician has duty to disclose to patient informed consent irrespective of custom                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - Scope of disclosure is not bright line, but must disclose all **material risk** ðŸ¡ª when a reasonable person would attach significance to a risk or cluster of risks in deciding                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - Juries should decide if risk is significant/disclosure is owed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - **When the alleged negligence is not about TREATMENT (*Brune)*, but about FAILURE TO DISCLOSE (*Canterbury):* The disclosure duty does NOT turn on the customs of the physicians practicing in the community.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - Treatment: By virtue of standardization, professionalization, etc. -- look to custom of industry                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - Duty to disclose: Do not trust the industry to set it's own standard.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - **If not custom, what IS the standard for failure to disclose?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - **What is it not?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |     - **[Duty based on the patient's questions?]{.underline}** (*NOPE -- asks too much of patients. Patients are often intimidated or don't know what questions to ask. Particularly given inequities & epistemic disparities btw patients and doctors, don't put burden on patient.)*                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |     - [**Bright line rule, full disclosure standard, disclose everything possible?**]{.underline} (*NOPE -- asks too much of doctors. Unrealistic and way too much.)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - **What is it?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |     - **[Disclosure must be REASONABLE UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES = DISCLOSURE OF ALL MATERIAL RISKS]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |       - **Material risks are risks that could potentially affect a reasonable person's decision-making**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |     - **[FORESIGHT, NOT HINDSIGHT]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |     - **[OBJECTIVE STANDARD:]{.underline}** Defendant should disclose risks that the doctor knows or should know to be material to a reasonable person in the patient's position.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                         +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                         | **[Why no intentional tort here (like *Mohr v. Williams* battery claim before the emergency consent carveout)?]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - *Canterbury:* Plaintiff alleges negligence AND battery, but battery ran out because of SOL                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - ***TODAY IN GENERAL:* Most courts take the view that: Failure to disclose is an instance of NEGLIGENCE, NOT BATTERY**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What are material risks?                                                | **[Factors to consider:]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - What is at stake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - Consequences if patient is not treated                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - Goals and expected outcome                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - Risks: probability and severity                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - Alternatives                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What if patient does not understand?                                    | - Doctor is not expected to guarantee understanding the risks                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - But if doctor *knows* that patient fails to comprehend, that could be evidence that the doctor did not make a reasonable effort to disclose (and needs to do more before carrying on before procedure)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What does NOT need to be disclosed?                                     | - Obvious risks -- infection, etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - Risks that the patient already knows -- don't need to repeat                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         | - Nonmaterial risks -- two different methods for the surgery that don't change much for the patient                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What if it's an emergency?                                              | - There is an emergency carveout                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Carveout within medical malpractice:                                    | - Standard: reasonable under the circumstances, disclose all material risks.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Duty to disclose is not set by custom.                                  |   - Material risk: risk that would affect a \[objective\] reasonable person's decision making about whether to undergo treatment.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                         |   - Depends on common sense.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
