|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           | - **OVERDETERMINED HARM = EACH ON ITS OWN WOULD HAVE SUFFICED**                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           | **Holding:** Joint and several liability ðŸ¡ª both parties fully responsible for the damage, and since train company is known, full burden on them                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           | - DF, one of the causes, is liable for entire damages.                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |   - Human-made fire + natural-made fire: DF would not be liable                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |   - Railroad hire + unknown-but-probably-human-made fire (equivalent proportion): DF *is* liable                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |     - [Why?]{.underline} We want the plaintiff to recover.                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |     - [Is this unfair to the defendant?]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |       - No, because the railroad can mount a defense by showing that the injury was caused by OTHER THINGS to defeat the causal claim of their fire entirely                                                                                  |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |         - E.g.: Argue that the other fire was caused by nature, the other fire did MORE of the damage than theirs, do some fact-finding and figure out who caused the other fire, etc.                                                        |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |   - Applying RST Â§27: The railroad did enough on its own to be the factual cause of the harm                                                                                                                                                  |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Other situations where joint & several liability is appropriate                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Over-determined Harm:**                                                                 | If it would have happened ANYWAY (because there were multiple causes that led to the same outcome) (***Kingston***): jointly & severally liable                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           | - E.g., 3 people push a car over a cliff. Force of 2 is enough to get it over the cliff. All three are jointly & severally liable.                                                                                                            |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Toxic Substances:**                                                                     | Exposure to asbestos from EMPLOYER A and from EMPLOYER B: Jointly & severally liable                                                                                                                                                          |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Time Lag Cause:**                                                                       | When one cause happens just after the other **ðŸ¡ª Not liable**                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           | - An act cannot be a factual cause of an outcome that already happened                                                                                                                                                                        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Accelerating Cause:**                                                                   | An act that makes harm occur faster than it would have (2 fires, 1 destroying something first is accelerating that destruction) ðŸ¡ª **Liable**                                                                                                  |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Policy:                                                                                   | Allows innocent PL to collect damages                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                           | - Unfair to require PL to pinpoint a particular DF; fair to hold single DF liable for it's a but for cause after all.                                                                                                                         |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

#### 2. Indeterminate Causes

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Indeterminate Causes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

| **[Â§ 433B Burden of Proof]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| \(1\) Except as stated in Subsections (2) and (3), the **burden of proof that the tortious conduct of the defendant has caused the harm to the plaintiff is upon the plaintiff.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| \(3\) Where the conduct of two or more actors is tortious \[both negligent\], and it is proved that **harm has been caused to the plaintiff by only one of them, but there is uncertainty as to which one has caused it, the burden is upon each such actor to prove that he has not caused the harm.**                                                                                                   |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| *[2 ACTORS: SIMPLE BURDEN SHIFTING]{.underline}*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| *2 actors are tortious and proved that harm done by just 1 one of them, but it\'s uncertain which, burden is on each to prove they didn\'t do it*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ***Summers v. Tice***                                                                         | **[Facts: 3 quail hunters. 2 shot the other negligently. One of the two DFs shot PL, but uncertain which one.]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| No, YOU shot him                                                                              | DIFFERENT from ***Kingston*** because **only one D is actual cause but unknown which**                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **Alternate liability (2 indeterminate defendants) = BURDEN SHIFTING**                        | - Assumption of risk defense (failed): Hunting is a dangerous activity                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - Contributory negligence defense (failed): PL was negligent by being out there and not yelling or ducking or anything                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | **[Holding: Burden shifting]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - [What if it seems like a 51% chance that it was Simon and 49% chance that it was Dan?]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   - Then Simon is liable & Dan is off the hook!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   - Why not just proportion accordingly, 51/49% of damages? Because then liability would not track fault! One defendant would be liable for damages that they DID NOT CAUSE. Fine for market-share liability, but not for individual defendants.                                                          |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - **Burden shifting:** If P can prove BOTH Ds acted negligently, the burden of causation shifts to each D to prove he did ***not*** cause it.                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   - Each will try to prove they are not the cause and if neither can they are both liable                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |     - If neither can prove that they did not cause it, then they are BOTH liable for the plaintiff's injury. The plaintiff still only gets the full amount one-time, but there's a battle at the damages stage about who pays more.                                                                       |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   - Indivisible injury = joint and several liability                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - Reminds us of res ipsa loquitor (in breach world) and *Ybarra* (unconscious patient).                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Policy:**                                                                                   | - Both DFs are wrongdoers, so it's fair to place the burden on them.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - DFs are in a better position to know/discover who did it.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - The alternative is to leave innocent PL with no remedy.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | <!-- -->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - Similar to *res ipsa loquitor*: PL, for no fault of his own, cannot prove X; law provides doctrinal device for burden shifting.                                                                                                                                                                         |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Res Ipsa Loquitor (BREACH)**                                                                                                                                                                    | **Simple Burden Shifting (Indetermine Causes) (CAUSATION)**                                                                                                                                           |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Smoke out the wrongdoer (*Ybarra)*                                                                                                                                                                | Smoke out the wrongdoer (*Summers)*                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Get the jury to infer that someone did something WRONG                                                                                                                                            | We know that someone did something wrong -- determine CAUSAL RESPONSIBILITY                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                   | (To even get to burden shifting and causation, must show BREACH for BOTH)                                                                                                                             |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [HYPO:]{.underline} Tall, thin, high rise apartment building. Local ordinance requires netting. Here, the plaintiff is injured by a falling flowerpot. Netting WOULD HAVE stopped the flowerpot from falling on the plaintiff. The Plaintiff sues the 20 people in the building who did not install nets. **Can the plaintiff use *Summers v. Tice* burden shifting here?**                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| - To even get to burden shifting on causation, need all the defendants to HAVE ALREADY SATISFIED DUTY & BREACH                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|   - **[PROVING BREACH:]{.underline}** Based on statutes & regulations, all 20 of these people breached (PER SE negligence).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|   - **[CAUSATION]{.underline}:** Only ONE of the 20 people is causally responsible.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|     - RST does not suggest an upper limit on number of defendants, but it's harder here than in *Summers v. Tice*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|       - *Summers v. Tice:* 50% chance each                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|       - *HERE:* *5%* chance each \[more speculative -- (1) Fairness concern; and (2) Less effective as information-forcing device\]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|     - COULD you make a *Summers v. Tice* burden shifting argument? Sure.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|       - **But in practice, Courts are reluctant to apply it to more than 2 defendants.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|         - But you still got injured. So who do you sue instead? Building/landlord/etc., for not enforcing or having backup.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| A PRODUCT that could have produced by MULTIPLE COMPANIES: **MARKET SHARE LIABILITY**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **When does market share liability apply? 4 factors. (*Sindell)***                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 1.  DFs are **all potential tortfeasors.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 2.  Product is **fungible** (identical and share the same defective properties). **\[In *Skipworth,*** companies did not have **identical formulae** (so not fungible)\]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 3.  **PL cannot identify wrongdoer** on her own, and through no fault of her own.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 4.  All DFs produced the product in the **same relevant time period. \[In *Skipworth,* 100 years is too high\]**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ##### PROS of Market Share Liability (Policy for extending *Summers v. Tice*)                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | CONS of Market Share Liability \[**RICHARDSON DISSENT!**\]                                        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1.  **Corrective justice** -- clearly breach, and PL suffers.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | \(1\) Ignoring causal connection. \[recall Posner in ***Howard***, the bus company case.\]        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                   |
| 2.  **Allocation of costs:** drug companies are better cost bearers; DF's amount of damages will be proportionate to liability.                                                                                                                                                                       | \(2\) Damages are unevenly and disproportionately put on DFs who can be sued in the state.        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                   |
| 3.  DF are in better position to **prove fault**/innocence.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | **(3) Deep pocket is not indicator of fault** (in THIS case to THIS P)                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                   |
| 4.  DF in better position to **prevent the harm.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | \(4\) **Disincentivizes** drug companies.                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                   |
| 5.  **Incentivize** drug companies to be cautious for safety.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                   |
| ##### **PL is not at fault** for failing to gather evidence.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                                                   |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #####                                                                                         | **Question:** May a plaintiff, injured as the result of a drug administered to her mother during pregnancy, who knows the type of drug involved but cannot identify the manufacturer of the precise product, hold liable for her injuries a maker of a drug produced from an identical formula?           |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ##### ***Sindell v. Abbott laboratories***                                                    | **Facts:** PL sued multiple drug companies who produced the same drug, for she did not know which brand was administered to her mother and thus caused her bladder tumor and adenosis.                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| #####                                                                                         | - Not alternate liability, unlike ***Summers***.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ##### Market-share liability                                                                  | - In what ways were the defendants NEGLIGENT \[I.E., **BREACH**\]?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **Many companies as indeterminate defendants = MARKET SHARE**                                 |   - Marketed DES on unlimited basis even though experimental drug; failed to warn; manufactured drug; etc.                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | **Trial Court:** Dismissed PL's complaint on **CAUSATION**: ground that PL could not identify which defendant had manufactured the drug that caused her injuries.                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - PL could not list all possible tortfeasors as DFs; the chance that a particular DF produced the drug is very low (\~1/200).                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | **Holding:** MARKET SHARE LIABILITY = Divide up liability by market share ***unless*** defendant demonstrates it could not have made the product which caused plaintiff's injuries (e.g. the company did not produce the drug until after the accident; didn't sell in the state).                        |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | [GENERAL RULE is that liability depends upon PLAINTIFF showing that defendant caused their injuries. EXCEPTIONS:]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - **This is NOT "alternative liability" like *Summers* and *Ybarra****:*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   - In *Summers,* there was a 50% chance for each defendant.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   - Here, it could be one of 200 companies that manufactured DES. The chances are too remote.                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - **[HERE: MODIFY *SUMMERS V. TICE* INSTEAD OF THROWING OUT CASE FOR LACK OF CAUSATION]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   - **[MARKET SHARE LIABILITY:]{.underline}** Divide up liability by market share *unless* defendant demonstrates it could not have made the product which caused plaintiff's injuries                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   - **[WHY?]{.underline}** In our contemporary industrialized society, advances in science and tech create fungible goods which may harm consumers often cannot be traced to any specific producer.                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |     - Courts can rigidly adhere, or adapt! Need a theory of liability in response to complex modern production.                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |     <!-- -->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |     - Corrective Justice: Plaintiff not at fault; defendants can better bear the cost of injury; manufacturers are in the best position to discover and guard against defects and warn of harmful effects                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   - **[Absent countervailing evidence, the plaintiff has made a prima facie claim for but-for causation]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |     - **Jury is allowed to infer causation from the fact that the defendant was part of the relevant market.**                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | (Departure -- usually, being part of a set is not enough infer causation)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Distinguished by ***Skipworth***                                                              | - **[Similar to *Sindell:*]{.underline}** PL cannot identify tortfeasor.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **NO** market share liability                                                                 | - **[DIFFERENT FROM *SINDELL* (DISQUALIFYING FOR MARKET SHARE LIABILITY): (1) TIME PERIOD; (2) FUNGIBILITY]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   1.  The time period for producing the lead paint product is over 100 years (too high)                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |       - Many companies entered/left the industry during the period, so some are clearly not responsible for the harm.                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               |   2.  The companies did not have identical formulae for the products (so not a "fungible" product).                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | <!-- -->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                               | - If there are departures from the 4 factors of *Sindell*, then a *Sindell-*style market share liability is not the way to go.                                                                                                                                                                            |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

#### 3. Lost Chances

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[Lost Chances]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| **[Limited to MEDICAL MALPRACTICE CONTEXTS (though could extend to pets)]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| What happens when P suffers harm that was likely to have happened even if D had not acted in such a way as to increase the risk of that harm still further?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+:=====================================================:+:================================================================================================================================================================:+:================================================================================================================================================================:+
| Unsettled doctrine                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+-------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ##### **1. Traditional Jurisdictions:**               | **Traditional analysis + preponderance of evidence: If LESS THAN 50% chance of survival prior to negligence, then P cannot recover**                                                                                                                                                                                                |
