|                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                       | - Fair to Ds that did not cause the harm                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                       | - ANYTIME there is a less than 50% chance of survival prior to the defendant's negligence, plaintiff cannot recover.                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                       |   - But SERIOUS policy problems:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                       |     - It's like writing a blank check to doctors in situations where plaintiff will likely not survive                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                       |     - What's the incentive to devote attention to people who are likely to die anyway?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ##### **2. *Herskovits* Jurisdictions:**              | **P needs to prove D\'s negligence caused *significant* reduction in chance of avoiding harm**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| \[MINORITY\]                                          | - Exempt from traditional standard of causation + preponderance of evidence standard                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                       | - More fair to Ps who can\'t prove D\'s negligence caused the harm and incentivizes non-negligent care                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                       +-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

### Proximate (\"Legal\") Cause 

+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Proximate Cause                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+=====================================================================================+=================================================================================================================================================================================================================+
| - **After establishing breach and factual cause**, now the fundamental question is normative: [would it be ***fair*** to hold DF be liable for the harm?]{.underline}                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| - For any tort claim, both factual cause and proximate cause need to be proved.                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| <!-- -->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| - Classic example of YES FACTUAL CAUSE but NO PROXIMATE CAUSE: surgeon fails vasectomy, and child is born; child grows up and burns house.                                                                                                                                                            |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[Restatement Â§ 30]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| An actor is not liable for harm when the tortious aspect of the actor's conduct was **of a type that does not generally increase the risk of that harm**.                                                                                                                                             |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #####                                                                               | - But-for causation is a legal fiction limiting scope of negligence liability for policy reasons (fairness, justice, efficiency, administrability)                                                              |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| But-for Cause (Factual) vs. Proximate Cause (Legal)                                 |   - Negligence can be a but-for cause w/o being a proximate cause                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     | - Actor isn\'t liable when their tortious conduct was NOT of type that generally increases the risk of that harm                                                                                                |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |   - Greater care does not reduce accidents                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     | - In sum, D is proximate cause for **type of harm that they should have foreseen**                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |   - Do not need to foresee the specific manner in which the harm came                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |   - Do not need to foresee the extent of the harm, just the type                                                                                                                                                |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ##### ***Berry v. Sugar Notch Borough***                                            | - Plaintiff was speeding; a tree was blown down on the car.                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |   - Liability requires a tie between type of DF's conduct and type of harm. Torts are not about coincidences!                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     | - [Alleged negligence here: The defendant's unstable tree was up]{.underline}                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |   - **Factual cause:**                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |     - PL argument: But-for D's negligence in not removing this tree, this injury would not have occurred (straightforward)                                                                                      |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |     - DF (tree owner) argument: PL was going too fast, which was itself a factual cause: since the PL would not have been in that spot at the moment the tree fell if not speeding. (Court: This is sophistry.) |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |       - Applying RST Â§30: An actor is not liable for harm when the tortious aspect of the actor's conduct was **of a type that does not generally increase the risk of that harm**.                             |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |         - Excess speed is tortious conduct, but does NOT increase the risk of a tree falling on you                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |         - Greater care by the actor would not save them from such accidents (but people making trees safe will)                                                                                                 |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| HYPO                                                                                | - X buys a bad vacuum that was negligently made by Y. After a few days, X takes it to be repaired. On the way to the repair shop, X gets hit by a car. Is Y a proximate cause?                                  |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |   - **Factual cause:** Yes                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                     |   - **Legal cause:** No, NO FORESEEABILITY                                                                                                                                                                      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

#### 1. Unexpected Harm

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Unexpected Harm                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |

| **Summary of unexpected harm:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| 1.  DF is liable only for the ***same general kind of harm*** that she should have foreseen and should have acted to avoid.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| 2.  DF may be held liable even if she did not foresee the ***specific manner*** in which the harm came to pass.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| 3.  DF may be held liable even though she did not foresee the ***extent*** of the harm.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| 4.  If PL has a preexisting condition, damages may be adjusted.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| - There are two tests for unexpected harms: **directness** and **foreseeability**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| - **Foreseeability is the DOMINANT test** ðŸ¡ª it is all about proximate causation, NOT damages (damages are NOT limited if foreseeability test is passed)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **BAD LAW - Directness Test** (In Re Polemis (1921)                                                                                                                                                                            | **GOOD LAW - Foreseeability** (Wagon Mound Cases)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| **Is the harm a [direct consequence]{.underline} of the negligent act?**                                                                                                                                                       | **Are the damages foreseeable?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| If *some* harm is foreseeable from negligent act and actual harm is direct (if not foreseeable), then negligent act is the legal cause of the harm                                                                             | Harm is not foreseeable, so DF is not liable.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Liability needs to correspond to common conscience.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [***In Re Polemis (BAD LAW):*** YES LIABLE BC **DIRECT** (THO NOT FORESEEABLE)]{.underline}                                                                                                                                    | ***[Wagon Mound (FORESEEABILITY = GOOD LAW)]{.underline}***                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| **Facts:** Ship owners leased to charterer to transport gas and D\'s employees caused a plank to fall which created an explosion that destroyed ship.                                                                          | **Facts:** DF left hatch open, spilling oil, and told PL it's safe. But days later, oil caught fire and destroyed the dock. Both dock owner and other ship owners sued for damages                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| **Holding:** Court: dropping the plank was negligent, so DF is liable for all harm that results. What matters is whether harm is ***direct*** result of DF's conduct, not foreseeability; foreseeability only bears on breach. | **Holding:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - Disregards *type* of harm ðŸ¡ª not expected type, but some type of damage WAS expected from a negligent act!                                                                                                                    | 1.  **1st case:** D could not have foreseen/reasonably expected the oil would set fire ðŸ¡ª despite their carelessness, no responsibility                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| **Policy:** it's better for the wrongdoer to bear the costs! The afterlife of the directness approach is that it's found in DAMAGES.                                                                                           |     a.  Not apply *Polemis* because it is an unfair rule.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 2.  **2nd case:** reasonable man in chief engineer\'s shoes would have foreseen the risk of fire ðŸ¡ª **since there is foreseeability, there is liability**                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                              **Direct Consequences: Hindsight!**                                                                                                   **Foreseeability: Foresight!**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|   -------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|   **Classic case**           ***In re Polemis***                                                                                                                   ***Wagon Mound***                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|   **Perspective**            **Ex post:** look from perspective of someone who knows the events; trace back to see if DF's negligence is direct cause of injury.   **Ex ante**: look from perspective of negligent actor. Before the events, could/should she foresee the ***type*** of harm?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|   **Operation**              DF = legal cause of all direct consequences of her negligent act.                                                                     DF = legal cause of types of harm that were reasonably foreseeable.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|   **Current status**         OBSOLETE                                                                                                                              WINNER!!!!!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|   **Eggshell interaction**   If **some harm** foreseeable and actual harm direct from negligence, D is proximate cause                                             If **type of harm** is unforeseeable, there is no legal causation ðŸ¡ª if it is foreseeable, then eggshell                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| \_\_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[1. PROXIMATE CAUSE:]{.underline} Is the harm the same TYPE/KIND/NATUE?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| SPACE TO ARGUE: At what level of generality do you characterize the risk and the harm?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **THREE GENERAL RULES OF PROXIMATE CAUSE:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| \(1\) D is liable only for the harm of the same general KIND that she should have foreseen and should have acted to avoid                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| \- Proximate cause when you create harms that you should have reasonably foreseen from your conduct                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| \- NOT liable for harms that you could NOT have reasonably foreseen (why the defendant in *Doughty* is not liable)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| \(2\) The defendant may be held liable even though she did not foresee the specific MANNER in which the harm came to pass                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| \- If the defendant should have foreseen harm of the same general kind or nature, the D does not escape liability merely bc the specific manner of the harm was unforeseeable (why the defendant in *Hughes* in still liable -- the explosion was a variant of the foreseeable fire)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| - E.g., If you negligently left out a toxic substance and an *earthquake* knocked it over; don't escape liability since it's still foreseeable type of [harm]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| YES proximate cause if D's harm caused a harm of the SAME TYPE                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | NO proximate cause if D's harm caused a harm of a DIFFERENT TYPE                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [***Hughes* (burning + explosion = same type**):]{.underline} DF works on manhole, site not well covered, child enters and plays with lamp, causing explosion.                                                                                                                                                     | [***Doughty* (splashing + explosion = different types):**]{.underline} No one was harmed by the splash, but the splash caused later explosion, injuring PL.                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| - [Holding:]{.underline} Burning is obviously foreseeable and explosion and burning are of the same type. A distinction would be "too fine to warrant acceptance"                                                                                                                                                  | - [Holding]{.underline}: No proximate cause. Splash and explosion belong to two distinct types, and the explosion is unforeseeable. This is so even though the chemicals were dangerous themselves. NO LIABILITY.                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|   - Defendant tries to distinguish the conduct (knocking the manhole into the chemicals) from the harm (explosion)                                                                                                                                                                                                 |   - P's lawyers: Try to abstract the risk to make same type of harm!! Is risk BURN or is risk EXPLOSION? They both spray molten liquid. Space to argue!                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|   - Space for contestation about the relevant harm!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | **[Like the nitroglycerin example:]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|   - Social context: plaintiffs are children (vs. adults)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - Chemist's nephew knocks over vial w toxic substance. Bottle hits nephew in foot. No chemical explosion but injures foot. Liability?                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| **[Like the Lost Chance Doctrine in but-for causation:]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - NO, BECAUSE INJURED FOOT IS NOT WHAT WE ASSOCIATE W TORTIOUS CONDUCT -- EXPLOSION IS.                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| - Recharacterizing injury as the lost chances, rather than death, in order to preserve but-for causation.                                                                                                                                                                                                          |   - **Match tortious conduct and harm through foreseeability.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| - Here, too, recharacterizing risk does important conceptual work in satisfying proximate cause.                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[2. DAMAGES:]{.underline} Is this LEVEL/DEGREE/MAGNITUDE of harm foreseeable?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| No space to argue                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \(3\) The defendant may be held liable even though she did not foresee the extent of the harm (EGGSHELL SKULL RULE) (e.g., *Brain Leech) (cf. Steinhauser)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **YES, if type of harm is foreseeable, then magnitude of harm is recoverable \[EGGSHELL SKULL RULE\]**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | **No, discount damages if the harm would have worsened anyway**                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                        |
