+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ***Smith v. Brain Leech:*** Eggshell skull \[but don't use this word\], magnitude of harm)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | ***Steinhauser v. Hertz*** (preexisting condition):                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - The negligent act: Negligence caused a molten splash onto P's lip. That metal burn caused PL's cancer.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | - Car accident caused schizophrenia.                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                        |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - D says they should be liable ONLY for burn, not death. Court disagrees: Eggshell skull equivalent for negligence.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                        |
|   - Can't avoid liability for an injury by arguing that the MAGNITUDE of P's injury was greater than might reasonably be expected. \[The RISK (BURN) was foreseeable, so D can't complain abt big damages\].                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - **If the type of harm (burning) is foreseeable, then DF is liable for all consequences that follow from the harm, even if the magnitude of harm is unforeseeably high.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                        |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| - **Eggshell skull rule:** In INTENTIONAL TORTS, at the damages stage, the defendant takes the plaintiff as he finds him                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| - **Equivalent:** In NEGLIGENCE, after proximate cause inquiry and decided that defendant is on the hook, the defendant takes the plaintiff as he finds him.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|   - E.g., X digs a hole in a park and leaves it there unmarked. Y falls in. X is clearly negligent: Breach, but-for causation, and proximate causation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|     - X should be liable for the damages that flowed directly from the fall-related injury, **even if they are unusual or unexpected**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|       - Like medical costs of sprained ankle, or if Y bites his tongue, develops a speech impediment, and lost out on a voice-over acting job. Take him as he comes!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|   - Is this unfair, since ankle is foreseeable, but speech impediment is not? Well, fall and attendant consequents are foreseeable. The risk is a FALL. And you are on the hook for plaintiff as you find him.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

#### 2. Intervening Causes

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Intervening Causes**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |

| What intervening causes count as superseding causes, severing the causal connection between the negligent conduct \[breach\] and the harm?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| - Only things that are NOT NORMAL CONSEQUENCES.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| Causal connection = but-for cause & proximate cause (foreseeability)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [RST Â§ 443 Normal Intervening Force]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| The intervention of a force which is **a normal consequence of a situation created by the actor's negligent conduct is not a superseding cause of harm** which such conduct has been a substantial factor in bringing about.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What are **NORMAL CONSEQUENCES?**                                                                                                                                                                                                         | USUAL, CUSTOMARY, TO BE EXPECTED                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - If you shoot a gun into the air, it is a NORMAL CONSEQUENCE for the bullet to come down                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - If you dump chemicals into a river, it would be NORMAL for gravity to carry the chemicals downstream                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What is a **SUPERSEDING CAUSE?**                                                                                                                                                                                                          | - Extinguishes liability!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - Superseding cause is a SISSOR that SNIPS THE CAUSAL CHAIN. It intervenes in such a way that it would be no longer fair to hold the defendant liable.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Subsequent negligent medical care?                                                                                                                                                                                                        | D is liable if P gets FURTHER INJURED in transportation on the way to the hospital to treat the injuries from D'S CONDUCT                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [RST Â§ 448 Intentionally Tortious or Criminal Acts \[by 3^rd^ party\] done under opportunity afforded by actor's negligence]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| The act of a **third person in committing an intentional tort or crime is a superseding cause of harm to another resulting therefrom**, although the actor's negligent conduct created the opportunity, [**unless the actor at the time of his negligent conduct realized or should have realized the likelihood that such a situation might be created**,]{.underline} and that a third person might avail himself of the opportunity to commit such a tort or crime.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Should the DF have realized the likelihood of third party's acts?                                                                                                                                                                         | - If not, third person is superseding cause.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |   - Even if DF created the risk.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - If so, DF is the cause.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ##### ***Brower***                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | **Facts:** D's negligence caused crash between their train and P. Railroad had guards but the guards only protected D's property, and did not protect P's spilled items. Third party thieves stole PL's property.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| (yes prox cause: railroad thief was not superseding cause)                                                                                                                                                                                | **Question:** Was the act of the thieves a normal intervening cause or a superseding cause? E.g., is the defendant's negligence **the proximate cause** of the plaintiff's harm?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | **Holding:** Thieves were not superseding cause. The theft was a [natural and probable result]{.underline} of DF's negligence. YES PROX CAUSE.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - The thieves did NOT intervene between D's negligence and the P's loss. D liable.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - Dissent says crash was not proximate cause of theft ðŸ¡ª cause broken by active intervention of independent criminal actor                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - **Just because there is an intervening actor does NOT mean that the chain of causation is broken**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |   - [Evidence #1: DF hired guards to protect their own goods!!!!! SO THEY KNEW THAT THEFT WAS FORESEEABLE.]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |   - [Evidence #2: D's negligence and P's loss were simultaneous and concurrent.]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |     - Superseding causes come after and snip the causal connection. But here, no snip.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |     - Historical development: The Last Wrongdoer Doctrine (now obsolete) -- assigned liability to last wrongdoer. Here, by calling the injury "simultaneous and concurrent," the court says that there is no last wrongdoer.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - Today: Follow the RST                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | **Applying RST Â§448 (consistent with this holding):** The act of a third person in committing an intentional tort or crime is a superseding cause of harm to another resulting therefrom, although the actor's negligent conduct created the opportunity, **unless the actor at the time of his negligent conduct realized or should have realized the likelihood that such a situation might be created**, and that a third person might avail himself of the opportunity to commit such a tort or crime     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - **A 3^rd^ party's tortious conduct may be sufficiently foreseeable that it does NOT break the causal chain:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |   - E.g., if a security's guard negligence allows a thief to steal things, the guard is proximately liable                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |     - But the bare fact of something taking place in \~urban life\~ may not be enough                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - **HERE,** if the 3^rd^ party seized the opportunity to STAB someone (in a personal vendetta) instead of just stealing things (a crime of opportunity), then THAT could be a superseding cause                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |   - **NOT A FORESEEABLE CRIME ðŸ¡ª YES SUPERSEDING CAUSE ðŸ¡ª NO PROXIMATE CAUSE**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [RST Â§ 449 Tortious or Criminal Acts the Probability of Which Makes Actor\'s Conduct Negligent]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| If the **likelihood that a third person may act in a particular manner is the hazard or one of the hazards which makes the actor negligent** \[is created by DF's conduct\], such an act whether innocent, negligent, intentionally tortious, or criminal **does not prevent the actor from being liable for harm caused thereby**.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Summary                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | **When DF creates risk to person A, DF is liable not only for harm to A, but also to rescuers who come to A's aid, so long as rescuer's efforts are not abnormal or completely hopeless.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - *A rescuer may be negligent (taking a risk that is unreasonable under the circumstances), but that goes to BREACH, not proximate cause. And today we have comparative negligence in many jxs.*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ##### ***Wagner***                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | **Facts:** P + cousin board streetcar and doors not closed so cousin falls out and P goes to investigate. P claims conductor asked him to do this (which conductor denies) and P is injured when he falls                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| (Cardozo: bad train rescue)                                                                                                                                                                                                               | **Holding:** Danger invites rescue, so P\'s reaction was natural/probable consequence.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - **If D creates a risk to person A, they are liable for rescuers so long as rescue attempt is not abnormal/completely hopeless**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - Cardozo: **RESCUE DOES NOT BREAK THE CHAIN OF CAUSATION BECAUSE "DANGER INVITES RESCUE" \[natural/probable\]**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |   - **Continuity is not broken by the exercise of volition:** Enough that the act, whether impulsive or [deliberate]{.underline}, is "child of the occasion".                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |     - Torts is the law of ACCIDENTS -- Mental state does not matter!! Whether your conduct created a risk that came to pass DOES matter!!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ##### ***Reckless rescuer?***                                                                                                                                                                                                             | - PL's conduct can still be factored in comparative negligence \[BREACH INQUIRY: DOES NOT AFFECT PROX CAUSE INQUIRY\]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
