|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |   - If rescuer is negligent (if he leapt 20 ft for his rescue), ask comparative/contributory ðŸ¡ª if comparative then some \$                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | - Can say that the rescuer was contributorily negligence                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **HYPOS**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \(1\) D is a gas company. Due to the negligence of one of its drivers, oil spills on the street. Third-party X, walking on the street, drops a match on the ground as she is lighting a cigarette. This causes the gas to ignite. In the ensuing explosion, plaintiff Y is injured.                                                                                                                                                                                                               | **Yes!**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| - **Is the defendant's breach the proximate cause of Y's injuries?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | - Foreseeable that people in an urban setting throw matches onto sidewalks. This is a foreseeable situation -- normal consequences ðŸ¡ª proximate cause.                                                                                                 |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \(2\) Same facts, but this time the person who drops the match is Z, a disgruntled former employee of the gas company who happens to be walking by. **Proximate cause?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | **Turns on further facts:** Yes still normal consequences if just a coincidence; NO proximate cause if the nature of the act was retaliatory and not a foreseeable street action                                                                      |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \(3\) This time, the disgruntled former employee had been following the truck with matches and told people that the defendant would pay for being so careless.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | **No proximate cause.** Unforeseeable intentionality.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| TAKEAWAYS:                                                                                                          | Proximate cause is not really about causation -- it's about FAIRNESS and what we think it is REASONABLE TO EXPECT ABOUT OTHER PEOPLE IN THE WORLD AS THEY ACT.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                     | - Where do we draw the line between irresponsibility and sheer bad luck?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                     | - Proximate cause uses foreseeability as our proxy for that. If something is foreseeable, then you should be held liable.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

#### 3. Unforeseeable Plaintiff 

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Unforeseeable Plaintiff: The Duty/Proximate Cause Connection                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |

| ##### ***Palsgraf v. Long Island R.R.***                                                                                                                   | **Facts:** P was in train station when train officials pushed man onto train 30 ft away, causing him to drop a package containing fireworks, which exploded. Many feet away, a scale fell on a woman.                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | **Cardozo:** No \"negligence in the air.\" For act to be negligent it must violate duty owed to a particular person. Injury was not foreseeable and D had no duty to P.                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - The harm is unforeseeable; no way to tell that the package was filled with fireworks.                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - **Tort law concerns relationships between parties; DF's negligence to the firework carrier does not extend to the injured woman. "Proof of negligence in the air will not do."!!**                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - No such thing as negligence in the air, only w/r/t OTHERS.                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - **\[FORESEEABILITY\] Not all invasions of one's bodily security are legally actionable. One is protected against unintentional invasions to her security only if there is unforeseeable risk.**                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - **Not tort if "no hazard was apparent to the eye of ordinary vigilance" = FORESEEABLE**                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            |     - E.g., If the box were LABELLED as being fireworks or hazardous, then Ms. Palsgraf likely wins here                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - **\[NO DUTY\] DF has no duty to PL: No duty from the railroad to Ms. Palsgraf because she is outside the range of apprehension**                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - Cardozo's Hypo: If a person jostles a neighbor in a crowd and they have a bomb that explodes, the person who is carrying a bomb is the negligent one, not the one who jostled.                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - **"The risk reasonably to be perceived defines the duty to be obeyed."**                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            |     - The orbit of the danger as disclosed to the eye of reasonable vigilance defines the orbit of duty.                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            |   - **Cardozo did not want to defer to the jury's "bias," so he turned it into a legal question.**                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | **Dissent**: D owes duty of care to world at large and is liable even to unforeseeable plaintiff so long as factual/legal cause of harm                                                                                                                                                      |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| "No proximate cause" and "No duty" have the same consequence, i.e. no liability.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| However, they are institutionally different.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **[Unforeseeable victim situations can be characterized as either NO DUTY CASES or NO PROXIMATE CAUSE cases!!!]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| Both shield from liability a defendant who has engaged in unreasonably risky conduct and who has caused harm.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| But, there are different institutional implications:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| +--------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+                                                                                                                                       |
| | Unforeseeable Victim           | **DUTY: "No duty to unforeseeable victim" finding**                                                                                         | **CAUSATION: "No proximate causation" finding**                                                                                  |                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                        |
| | **Effect on the Claim?**       | No liability, even if D engaged in unreasonably risky conduct (b/c no duty)                                                                 | No liability even if D engaged in unreasonably risky conduct (b/c not proximate cause)                                           |                                                                                                                                       |
| |                                |                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                  |                                                                                                                                       |
| | **\[THE SAME\]**               |                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                  |                                                                                                                                       |
| +--------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+                                                                                                                                       |
| | **Legal or Factual Inquiry?**  | **Legal** Inquiry ðŸ¡ª CONNECT THIS w/ causation section of answers to get full points                                                         | **Factual** Inquiry ðŸ¡ª CONNECT THIS w/ duty section of answers to get full points                                                 |                                                                                                                                       |
| +--------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+                                                                                                                                       |
| | **Decisionmaker?**             | **Judge**                                                                                                                                   | **Jury**                                                                                                                         |                                                                                                                                       |
| +--------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+                                                                                                                                       |
| | **Limited vs. Broad Holding?** | **Broad**: judge wants to make a [categorical statement]{.underline} re: who owes duties to whom                                            | **Narrow/limited:** finding closely tied to the facts of particular D and P                                                      |                                                                                                                                       |
| +--------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+                                                                                                                                       |
| | **Policy Considerations?**     | - Duty to X = "be on the look out for X" and be prepared to sacrifice some of your autonomy and self-interest for others: overly expansive! | - Unfair due to remoteness (not blameworthy)                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                       |
| |                                |                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                  |                                                                                                                                       |
| |                                | -                                                                                                                                           | - Unhelpful w/r/t incentives to hold remote factual causes liable if couldn't foresee harm (couldn't adapt behavior to avoid it) |                                                                                                                                       |
| +--------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+                                                                                                                                       |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| RST Â§ 281, Comment c:                                                                                                                                      | In order for the actor to be negligent with respect to the other, his conduct must create a **recognizable risk of harm to the other individually, or to a class of persons**---as, for example, all persons within a given area of danger---of which the other is a member. . .             |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - RST accepts the *Palsgraf* holding on foreseeability, but they take no position on whether it is a question of duty or proximate cause                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - Defendants are liable only for the general type of harm that they should have reasonably foreseen and acted to avoid                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - ***Palsgraf**:* Defendants are liable only to plaintiffs who are in the same general class of people who are at risk from the negligence (if not, you are an unforeseeable victim, and defendants are not liable to unforeseeable plaintiffs even if they are a but-for cause of the harm) |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Dobbs Treatise:                                                                                                                                            | - "The great majority of cases hold negligent defendants liable only for harm of the same general kind that they should have reasonably foreseen and should have acted to avoid."                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - "The same principle holds defendants liable only to plaintiffs who are in the same general class of people who were at risk from his negligence."                                                                                                                                          |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Duty or Proximate Cause                                                                                                                                    | Do not take from *Palsgraf* the idea that the duty element always turns on foreseeability. Duty does NOT always have to do with foreseeability.                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                            | - **Foreseeability is not the lodestar for duty the way it is for proximate cause. But imputing duty to unforeseeable victims can be legally questionable.**                                                                                                                                 |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

## DUTY

+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Default/Baseline = Duty of reasonable care under the circumstances                                                                                             |
+=====================================================+==========================================================================================================+
| **CONTROVERSIAL SPACE 1: CLAIMING NO DUTY AT ALL**  | What about when someone does not the help someone who needs help? No duty to rescue. But yes exceptions. |
+-----------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **CONTROVERSIAL SPACE 1: CLAIMING HEIGHTENED DUTY** | What about the argument that there should be a HIGHER duty                                               |
+-----------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Two-Step Duty Analysis:                                                                                                                                        |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1.  **DUTY OR NO DUTY?**                                                                                                                                       |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 2.  **WHAT IS THE CONTENT OF THAT DUTY?**                                                                                                                      |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

### 1. Duty to Rescue 

+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Duty to Rescue                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |

| **[Restatement Â§ 37:]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| An actor whose conduct has not created a risk of physical or emotional harm to another has **no duty of care to the other unless a court determines that one of the \[affirmative duty exceptions\] is applicable.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **COMMON LAW**                                                                                                                                                                       | **In general, defendant is not liable for a pure failure to act for the plaintiff's benefit, even if defendant foresees harm and even if rescue would cost nothing. \[Unless an exception applies.\]**                                                                                                                                                                     |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **No duty to rescue**                                                                                                                                                                | - JUST BECAUSE YOU COULD, TORT LAW DOESN'T SAY YOU SHOULD                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - Rescuing someone in peril may be a moral obligation, but not a legal obligation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - Tort law not tracking our intuitions -- costs to a no duty to rescue rule                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |   - Rule allows for many situations where there is no legal liable for situations that we may think are callous at best and reprehensible at worst                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Policy:**                                                                                                                                                                          | - Administrability: No workable alternative                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| Why have the rule?                                                                                                                                                                   | - Liberty and autonomy                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - People are altruistic and will rescue anyway so no need for a legal duty                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - Act/Omission distinction (but uncompelling because hard to distinguish - a negligent act can be an act or an omission)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | On the other hand -- Peter Singer's utilitarianism?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Exceptions to duty to rescue:**                                                                                                                                                    | 1.  D and P have special relationship                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | 2.  D created the danger (if you didn\'t create the risk, no liability)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |     a.  **RST:** If prior conduct, even non-tortious, creates continuing risk of physical harm of type characteristic of the conduct, actor has duty to exercise reasonable care to prevent/minimize the harm                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | 3.  D acted affirmatively to aid helpless P                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |     a.  Liable if: 1) no reasonable care to secure their safety **or** 2) stopping and leaving them worse off                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | 4.  3rd person is giving/ready to give aid to endangered P (duty not to prevent or disable the 3rd person)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |     a.  (**RST** know or have reason to know)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Exception 1: Special Relationship** (One has affirmative duties when there is special relationship with the PL.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **A. FRIENDSHIP**                                                                                                                                                                    | **Facts:** P and friend talked to girls who complained they were being followed. Boys chased them off and badly beat P. Friend found him after and gave aid and drove him around. But when he fell asleep he drove him to his grandparents and left him in the car when he couldn't get him up. P died ðŸ¡ª more likely than not would have lived                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| ***Farwell v. Keaton***                                                                                                                                                              | - **BREACH: Failure** to act to take P to the hospital or notify P's family that he was injured                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| ##### (leaving bleeding friend)                                                                                                                                                      | - **CAUSATION:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |   - **1. FACTUAL CAUSE:** But for the failure to take him to a hospital or notify family, Farwell would not have died                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |   - **2. PROXIMATE CAUSE:** It was foreseeable that he needed medical attention                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | **Holding: Yes, D is liable. Affirmative duty to aid here due to friendship -- companions on a social venture (special relationship)**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
