|                                                                                                            |     a.  What if YOU don't know that there is a puddle on your property? NO DUTY -- only liable for dangers that you know of                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            |     b.  What if the puddle is OBVIOUS TO ANYONE? NO DUTY -- not hidden and no duty to inspect. Must not willfully injure tho.                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | C.  Trespasser: No duty                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            |     a.  Just don't willfully injure                                                                                                                                                                                          |

| **2. \[APPLY TO CHILDREN ONLY\] Restatement Â§ 339: Duties** **To TRESPASSING CHILDREN**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [A possessor of land is subject to liability for physical harm to children trespassing thereon caused by an artificial condition upon the land if:]{.underline} \[SATISFY ALL\]                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| a)  **\[OBVIOUS THAT CHILDREN WILL TRESPASS\]:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|     a.  the place where the condition exists is one upon which the possessor knows or has reason to know that **children are likely to trespass**, and                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|         i.  *\[KIDS DON'T HAVE FULL AWARENESS OF CONSEQUENCES!!!!\]*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| b)  **\[UNREASONABLE RISK OF HARM\]:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|     a.  the condition is one of which the possessor knows or has reason to know and which he realizes or should realize will involve an **unreasonable risk** of death or serious bodily harm to such children, and                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| c)  **\[CHILDREN WON'T KNOW THE RISK\]**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|     a.  the children because of their youth **do not discover the condition or realize the risk** involved in intermeddling with it or in coming within the area made dangerous by it, and                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| d)  **\[BURDEN IS SMALL\]**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|     a.  the utility to the possessor of maintaining the condition and the **burden** of eliminating the danger are slight as compared with the risk to children involved, and                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|         i.  *\[BALANCE OF BENEFIT AND COST:* In *United Zinc,* some cost to filling the pit but definitely NO BENEFIT\]                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| e)  **\[NO REASONABLE CARE TO ELIMINATE RISK\]**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|     a.  the possessor fails to exercise **reasonable care to eliminate the danger** or otherwise to protect the children.                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Rationale for sections (a) & (b): Must be OBVIOUS and risk must be UNREASONABLE                            | LIMITATIONS - Don't want to hold defendant liable due to principles of tort law:                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - it's not **fair** to hold people liable for things they can't foresee                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - it doesn't **incentivize** people to change their behaviors if they don't know about it                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - there's a sanctity of **private property.**                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            |   - Don't need to do audits -- just see whether it's OBVIOUS that                                                                                                                                                            |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Rationale for section (c) and (d)                                                                          | Classic balancing test: preserve activities that generate a lot of social benefit when the cost of burdening them is unduly high                                                                                             |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ATTRACTIVE NUISANCE?                                                                                       | - Adults = trespassers so no duty                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - But since they\'re kids, you cannot knowingly establish & expose an unfenced temptation                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            |   - Kids follow a bait as mechanically as fish (MUST be cautiously applied)                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - **Children treated as *invitees* if there is an attractive nuisance** ðŸ¡ª **need reasonable care then**                                                                                                                      |

| #####                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ##### **3. \[MODERN\] THE *ROWLAND* FACTORS for liability for injuries of those who enter the land *(8 states)***                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 1.  Foreseeability of harm to PL's class of people                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 2.  Certainty that PL suffered injury *\[trivial for exam\]*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 3.  Closeness of connection between DF's conduct and the injury *\[look at character of accident to think backward about whether there was a DUTY\]*                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 4.  Moral blame attached to DF's conduct                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 5.  Policy of preventing future harm *\[would liability here DETER future harm?\]*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 6.  Cost of exercising duty: Burden to DF and influence on larger community of imposing a duty to exercise care                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 7.  Availability/cost/prevalence of insurance *\[less draconian to impose on homeowners bc they have insurance\]*                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Problems with tripartite system -- reason for needing a new one                                            | *PROBLEMS W TRIPARTITE SYSTEM:*                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - Created a SEMANTIC MORASS                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            |   - To make the old rule work, courts have had to increasingly split hairs and make more nuanced categories/exceptions                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            |   - Court sees these categories as "vestiges of feudalism"                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - Don't track our moral intuitions                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | *DEFENSE OF TRIPARTITE SYSTEM:*                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - *Don't let perfect be the enemy of good -- there is a stable and predictable old system that has amendments that make it work.*                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - *Rule of law says don't replace RULES with squishy STANDARDS (but many problems with that lol -- just exercise judgment)*                                                                                                  |

|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| ##### ***Rowland v. Christian***                                                                           | - Defendant was aware that there was a defect. The defect was latent, not obvious.                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| #####                                                                                                      | - As the PL was about to use the faucet, the D neither warned him or nor remedied the condition.                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| ##### (broken faucet hurt guest)                                                                           | **[QUESTION]{.underline}:** What is liability of possessor of land for injuries to persons who enter upon that land?                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - ***Rowland*** court: trichotomy does not match responsibility. The factors below account for particular situations & are fairer.                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | **[TEST]{.underline}:** Whether in the management of property, **the landowner has acted as a reasonable person** regarding the probability of injury.                                                                       |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - **Roland factors:** closeness of connection b/w D\'s conduct/injury, moral blame, availability/prevalence of insurance for risk; extent of burden to D; foreseeability of harm; consequences to community of imposing duty |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | **[HOLDING]{.underline}:** [If owner is aware of concealed condition w/ unreasonable risk of harm for those contacting it and is aware that person will contact it, then failure to warn/repair = negligent]{.underline}     |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - Trial court erred in granting motion for summary judgment and case is remanded                                                                                                                                             |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ##### Analysis if someone gets hurt in someone's house/apartment                                           | **1. IS THERE A DUTY (*ROWLAND ANALYSIS)*:** Consider *Rowland* factors and decide if they cut in favor of the landowner or the plaintiff                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - Come to an **all things considered decision:** If the factors cut in favor of the plaintiff, there is a duty. \[usually yes duty\]                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            |   - If yes, what is that duty? **To act as reasonable person in view of the probability of injury to others. (*Rowland*)**                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | **2. IF YES, IS THERE A BREACH:** Use the standard of care for a property owner from *Rowland -* Has the landowner acted as a reasonable person in view of the probability of injury to others?                              |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - Reasonable person, custom, BPL, res ipsa, etc.                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            |   - Only thing that changes for landowner cases is that you can **also consider the old tripartite status** of the person on the property (trespasser/invitee/etc.)                                                          |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| MAPPING ONTO TRIPARTITE SYSTEM                                                                             | Practically, *Rowland* factors often track the outcomes that would have been reached under the traditional tripartite common law rules                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                            | - Trespassing & invitee = bear on *Rowland* FORESEEABILITY factor                                                                                                                                                            |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 4\. Modified *Rowland* analysis: The duty of reasonable care applies to incenses and invitees, but a lower standard for trespassers (18 jurisdictions)                                                                                                                                                                                    |

### Duties Arising From Special Relationships 

+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Duties Arising From Special Relationships:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| **There is a duty to protect against [third-party harms]{.underline} when there is a [special relationship]{.underline} with the third-party or the plaintiff**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |

| [RST Â§ 315:]{.underline} There is **no duty so to control the conduct of a third person** as to prevent him from causing physical harm to another, **unless**:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \(a\) a special relation exists **between the actor and the \[offender\]** third person which imposes a duty upon the actor to control the third person\'s conduct, or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ##### Actors and offenders                                                                                                                                                           | Custodians and wards                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| #####                                                                                                                                                                                | - [Parents and children:]{.underline} Parents have duty to exercise reasonable care to control the conduct of their child so that the child does not harm parties in the vicinity                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - [Doctors and patients]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| #####                                                                                                                                                                                | [RSTÂ§315a: Duty to control the third person's conduct - Special relation between doctor and the patient (offender)]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| ##### RSTÂ§315a:                                                                                                                                                                      | **Question:** Does a therapist have a duty to warn third-parties at risk of being harmed by a patient?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| ##### **E.g., THERAPIST**                                                                                                                                                            | **Holding:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| ##### ***Tarasoff v. Regents of the University of California***                                                                                                                      | 1\. Is there a duty? \[YES\]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - There is a special relationship between doctor and patient.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | 1(a). To whom does the therapist owe a duty of care?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - To a third party that might be at risk.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | 2\. What is the duty? \[MORE THAN JUST "REASONABLE CARE UNDER CIRCUMSTANCES"\]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - A therapist has a duty to exercise reasonable care to protect a **foreseeable victim**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |   - **SPLIT:** many courts require a [particular/identifiable]{.underline} victim                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |     - ***Nguyen v. MIT***: no duty because no sign that the student was suicidal -- not **foreseeable**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |     - *Thomson v. Alameida*: No duty to the victim when the patient told his therapist that would kill a child. No SPECIFIC child victim identified.                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | 3\. When is the duty triggered?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - When the therapist has determined or should have determined, under relevant professional standards \[custom\], that a patient poses a serious danger to others.                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | 4\. What is the act that makes the therapist liable?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - Alleged negligence is a failure to issue a warning after the patient themselves offers a prediction of violence                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      +----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | **Reasoning for finding duty:** Doctor in position of control; doctor knows patient's condition; patient not in position to control own behavior                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - Counselors don't like this: Psychiatrists filed amicus brief arguing that it would be unworkable and unfair                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | - But court: you'll be alright. You're only required to exercise reasonable care! Like custom.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |   - No duty to accurately predict or forecast behavior -- just need an exercise of that reasonable degree of care and skill ordinarily exercised by other therapists under similar circumstances                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |   - Sounds like CUSTOM: standard of care in medical malpractice cases                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| \(b\) a special relation exists **between the actor and the \[victim\]** other which gives to the other a right to protection.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| What kinds of Special Relations give rise to duty to aid or protect?                                                                                                                 | RST Â§ 314A (1)-(4):                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| **\[CONTROLLING\]**                                                                                                                                                                  | 1.  A **common carrier** is under a duty to its passengers                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| Aid/protect â‰  rescue                                                                                                                                                                 | 2.  An **innkeeper** is under a similar duty to his guests.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | 3.  A **possessor of land** who holds it open to the public is under a similar duty to members of the public who enter in response to his invitation.                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      | 4.  One who is required by law to take or who voluntarily takes the **custody** of another under circumstances such as to deprive the other of his normal opportunities for protection is under a similar duty to the other.                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
