|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |     - **Would be unfair under a negligence standard to hold the defendant liable in this case**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |   - Res ipsa loquitor -- something bad happened that would not have happened in the absence of negligence                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    | - CAUSATION -- Coca Cola's argument: Bottle could have gotten messed up at the distributer or some intermediary                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    | **Holding:** Res ipsa loquitor ðŸ¡ª inference of breach of duty of care                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    | **Traynor concurrence (takeaway):** manufacturer should be strictly liable because manufacturer can do what public cannot                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    | - **Strict Liability Carveouts** (that don't exist in absolute liability)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |   - Product must be used in **normal and proper use**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |   - Product must be defective **when it hits the market; manufacturer not liable for harms from 3^rd^ party modifications**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    | - **Policy of Strict Liability** [\[**EXAM TOPIC???\]**]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |   1)  **[Deterrence/Cheapest cost avoider rationale]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       a.  Place the burden with the party who is best equipped to prevent the harm                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       b.  Manufacturer is often better equipped to test the product and discover hidden defects than the retailer.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       c.  Public policy demands liability to those who can most effectively reduce danger of products put on market knowing they\'ll be used w/o further inspection                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |   2)  **[Loss-spreading rationale]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       a.  Manufacturer is better equipped to bear the costs than the individual purchaser.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       b.  Can spread the costs by selling goods at a higher price                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       c.  Informational capacities: Manufacturer can predict that some accidents will occur (research on accident risk rate) and can save money to pay for these accidents                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |           (i) Individuals cannot spread cost and cannot predict that accidents will occur                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |   3)  **[Transparency and pragmatism about the working of the negligence rule]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       a.  If negligence applies, plaintiff will resort to res ipsa like in *Escola.* It's also hard for manufacturers to defend against it. The result in practice will end up functioning like strict liability -- so for transparency about the pragmatic functioning of the law, just call it strict liability (walks/talks/feels like strict liability)                                |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |   4)  **[Implied warranties of sale basically account for this already]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       a.  Implied warranty of sale: When you sell a good, it comes w/ implied warranty that it's good for what it's sold for                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       b.  Implied warranties make retailers strictly liable for harm to consumers and retailers can recoup losses from the manufacturer or wholesaler -- each party sues up the chain, but that's needlessly circuitous and litigious                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       c.  Strict liability can be make liability go directly from consumer to manufacturer as defendant without going up the legal chain                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |   5)  **[Modern Producer/consumer relationship and the nature of the mass market]{.underline}**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       a.  Manufacturing processes are frequently inaccessible to the public or beyond the ken -- consumer has no skill or means to investigate for themselves the soundness of the product, and the retailer is a mere conduit for goods that also does not test the product                                                                                                               |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       b.  Modern consumer relationship makes strict liability attractive                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    | - **Traynor's opinion is a tour-de-force in legal realism: Marshalling doctrinal arguments to serve concern about how law works in the real world, instead of participating in the formalism of traditional tort law ðŸ¡ª influenced 2^nd^ Restatement**                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    | - **CONTRACT-BASED CLAIMS VS. TORT-BASED CLAIMS** (note 3, p. 558)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

Strict liability in the contract arena (1960s)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

Yuba Power Products (1963):*** CA Supreme Court says liability is not governed by contract warranties!!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

|                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                    |       - That doesn't work when tied to closely to the law of sale                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |

## What is a Defect?

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **What constitutes a defect?**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

| Restatement (3d.) (Products Liability) Â§ 1: Liability of Commercial Seller or Distributor for Harm Caused by Defective Products (RST)\                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| Restatement (3d.) (Products Liability) Â§ 2: Categories of Product Defect -- and selected comments (RST)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| - **In products liability:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|   - Authors are a half step in front of the courts rather than behind them: Restatement reads like the DREAMS/ASPIRATIONS of tort law scholars                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|   - For products liability, organize **around the 3^rd^ Restatement because it most closely matches contemporary developments**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| - **2^nd^ RST does not provide a succinct formulation of what is a defect -- but comment G gives a good sense**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| RST (2d.) Â§ 402A: Special Liability of Seller of Product for Physical Harm to User or Consumer \[**TRYING TO PUSH THE LAW FORWARD\]**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| 1.  **One who sells any product in a defective condition unreasonably dangerous to the user or consumer or to his property is subject to liability for physical harm thereby caused to the ultimate user or consumer, or to his property, if**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|     (a) **the [seller is engaged in the business of selling such a product]{.underline}, and**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|     (b) **it [is expected to and does reach the user or consumer without substantial change in the condition in which it is sold]{.underline}**[.]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| 2.  **The rule stated in Subsection (1) applies although**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|     (a) **the seller has exercised all possible care in the preparation and sale of his product, and**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|     <!-- -->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|     (a) **the user or consumer has not bought the product from or entered into any contractual relation with the seller.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| ***Caveat*: The Institute expresses no opinion as to whether the rules stated in this Section may not apply**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| (1) **to harm to persons other than users or consumers;**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| (2) **to the seller of a product expected to be processed or otherwise substantially changed before it reaches the user or consumer; or**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| (3) **to the seller of a component part of a product to be assembled.**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| Selected comments:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **WHO CAN BE SUED?**                                                                                                                                                                                | - The rule stated in this Section applies to any person engaged in the business of selling products for use or consumption.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **f.**                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - It therefore applies to **any manufacturer of such a product, to any wholesale or retail dealer or distributor, and to the operator of a restaurant**.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **Business of selling**                                                                                                                                                                             | - The rule does not, however, apply to the occasional seller of food or other such products who is not engaged in that activity as a part of his business. **\[can still sue for negligence tho!\]**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |   - Risk: Protection from strict liability for casual sellers because merchants accept a risk by operating in the market                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |   - Logic of loss-spreading: A casual seller has no mechanism for spreading losses, the way a big corporation could raise prises.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |   - Thus it does not apply to the housewife who, on one occasion, sells to her neighbor a jar of jam or a pound of sugar.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |   - Nor does it apply to the owner of an automobile who, on one occasion, sells it to his neighbor, or even sells it to a dealer in used cars, and this even though he is fully aware that the dealer plans to resell it.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     | - The basis for the rule is the ancient one of the special responsibility for the safety of the public undertaken by one who enters into the business of supplying human beings with products which may endanger the safety of their persons and property, and the forced reliance upon that undertaking on the part of those who purchase such goods.                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |   - This basis is lacking in the case of the ordinary individual who makes the isolated sale, and he is not liable to a third person, or even to his buyer, in the absence of his negligence. . .                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **WHAT IS A DEFECT?**                                                                                                                                                                               | - The rule stated in this Section applies only where the product is**, [at the time it leaves the seller\'s hands]{.underline}**, in **a condition [not contemplated]{.underline} by the ultimate consumer, which will be [unreasonably dangerous]{.underline} to him**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **g.**                                                                                                                                                                                              |   - The seller is not liable when he delivers the product in a safe condition, and subsequent mishandling or other causes make it harmful by the time it is consumed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **Defective condition**                                                                                                                                                                             | - The burden of proof that the product was in a defective condition at the time that it left the hands of the particular seller is upon the injured plaintiff; and unless evidence can be produced which will support the conclusion that it was then defective, the burden is not sustained. . .                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| h\.                                                                                                                                                                                                 | - A product is not in a defective condition when it is safe for normal handling and consumption.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| Abnormal handling â‰  Defective Product                                                                                                                                                               |   - **If the injury results from abnormal handling**, as where a bottled beverage is knocked against a radiator to remove the cap, or from abnormal preparation for use, as where too much salt is added to food, or from abnormal consumption, as where a child eats too much candy and is made ill, the seller is not liable.                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     | - Where, however, he has reason to anticipate that danger may result from a particular use, as where a drug is sold which is safe only in limited doses, **he may be required to give adequate warning of the danger** (see Comment *j*), and **a product sold without such warning is in a defective condition.**                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **WHAT IS UNREASONABLY DANGEROUS ?**                                                                                                                                                                | - The rule stated in this Section applies only where the [**defective condition of the product makes it unreasonably dangerous to the user or consumer**.]{.underline}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **i. Unreasonably dangerous**                                                                                                                                                                       |   - Many products cannot possibly be made entirely safe for all consumption, and any food or drug necessarily involves some risk of harm, if only from over-consumption. Ordinary sugar is a deadly poison to diabetics, and castor oil found use under Mussolini as an instrument of torture. That is not what is meant by "unreasonably dangerous" in this Section.                                                                                                                                                     |
